properties.title: New Apartments Rongai
properties.description: Are you looking to live amongst the bustle of Nairobi? Or maybe you prefer to wake up to sea views in Mombasa? With over 7,500+ listings for sale, BuyRentKenya can match you with a property to call home. Get exclusive insights into popular neighbourhoods such as Karen, Westlands and Kiambu Road. Filter down to what's important for you. Looking only for 3 bed houses in Nairobi? Or do you long for a lovely townhouse rather than a Nairobi apartment? We can guide you to the best places to invest.
